players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
Diana: "That's a bold accusation, Bob. Why are you so quick to point fingers when we just lost Alice?"
Charlie: "I think we need more than just accusations. Bob, what's your evidence against Diana?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso; I investigated her last night and have proof. We can't afford to hesitate—arresting her now protects us all."
Diana: "Bob claims he investigated Diana, but there's only one detective. If he's the real detective, why would he reveal himself so early? That seems like a mafia tactic to me."
Charlie: "I'm voting for Bob. His claim doesn't add up - if he were detective, revealing himself immediately puts him at risk. This feels like a mafia play."
